title: Detailed Skills content with category images and Portfolio reuse

requirements.summary: Replace meter-only Skills categories with detailed English content sections for Legal (short), Digital Marketing (short), Graphics Design (detailed), Video Editing (basic but detailed), and WordPress Website Design (detailed, WordPress-only).
acceptanceCriteria: The Skills page no longer shows only percentage meters for the main categories; it shows detailed written content per category.

Legal Skills and Digital Marketing are presented as shortened, portfolio-friendly summaries (not the full long text blocks), while Graphics Design, Video Editing (basic), and WordPress Website Design are presented with detailed descriptions.

The detailed content includes the user-requested items: legal areas (e.g., land, crime, tax), digital marketing items (Facebook page creation/optimization, post scheduling, ads, social media management, SEO, SMM), graphics design categories (logo, banner, flyer, t-shirt, etc.), video editing basic (image add, text writing, etc.), and WordPress website design categories (site builder/development related).
All user-facing text on the updated sections is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a single source of truth for the five Skills Details categories (headings, short paragraphs, and bullet lists) matching the requested scope: Legal Skills (short), Digital Marketing (short), Graphics Design (detailed), Video Editing (basic but detailed), WordPress Website Design (WordPress-only, detailed).

Add a reusable Skills Details section component that renders the categories from frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts with headings, paragraphs, and bullet lists. Use shadcn-ui Card (and related primitives) for consistent section/card layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update the Skills page to render the new detailed Skills Details section (and remove the main-category meter grid usage). Ensure all visible text is English and matches the requested level of detail per category.

requirements.summary: Add one static image per skill category and render it alongside each detailed Skills section/card with meaningful English alt text and responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Each of the five skill categories (Legal, Digital Marketing, Graphics Design, Video Editing, WordPress Website Design) displays one image next to/within its section/card.
All images are served from static assets in the frontend (no backend image serving).
All images include meaningful English alt text and do not break layout on mobile/tablet/desktop.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static asset for the Legal Skills category image at frontend/public/assets/generated/skills-legal.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated static asset for the Digital Marketing category image at frontend/public/assets/generated/skills-digital-marketing.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated static asset for the Graphics Design category image at frontend/public/assets/generated/skills-graphic-design.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated static asset for the Video Editing category image at frontend/public/assets/generated/skills-video-editing.dim_1200x800.png.
Add the generated static asset for the WordPress Website Design category image at frontend/public/assets/generated/skills-wordpress-webdesign.dim_1200x800.png.
Wire each skills category to its corresponding static image path under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and define meaningful English alt text per category.

Render each category image with its corresponding alt text inside the Skills Details cards/sections, ensuring responsive behavior (image + content stacks on small screens and aligns side-by-side on larger screens). Use shadcn-ui Card layout patterns for consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a 'Skills Details' section beneath the projects grid on the Portfolio page, reusing the same detailed skills content and images as the Skills page.
acceptanceCriteria: The Portfolio page includes a visible section labeled "Skills Details" (English) beneath the projects grid.
The "Skills Details" section displays the same detailed category content and images as the Skills page (no duplicated inconsistent text).
The Portfolio page remains responsive and maintains existing project filtering and grid behavior.

file_operations.description: Add a new section labeled "Skills Details" below the ProjectsGrid, rendering the shared SkillsDetailsSection component so content/images remain consistent with the Skills page.

Support a reusable rendering mode suitable for embedding on Portfolio (e.g., optional heading display or spacing variants), while still sourcing all content from frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts. Use shadcn-ui components for consistent typography/card structure. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
